Package com.frc5113.library.oi.joystick

Class Joystick

java.lang.Object
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.GenericHID
edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
com.frc5113.library.oi.joystick.Joystick
public class Joystick extends edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick
Equivalent to a flight simulator joystick commonly used in FRC: Example Image

  • Constructor Details

    • Joystick

      public Joystick(int port)
      Create simple joystick (with no-op curves)
      Parameters:
      port - DS Port of Joystick

    • Joystick

      public Joystick(int port, Curve xCurve, Curve yCurve, Curve tCurve)
      Create with curves
      Parameters:
      port - DS Port of Joystick
      xCurve - Curve to adjust X Axis
      yCurve - Curve to adjust Y Axis
      tCurve - Curve to adjust Twist Axis
